column1: "description": "Forest Cover is defined as \u201cAll lands more than one hectare in area
column2: with a tree canopy density of more than 10 % irrespective of ownership and legal status. Such lands may not necessarily be a recorded forest area. It also includes orchards bamboo and palm.\u201d The table shows Total Forest Cover w.r...."
